title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing snow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing snow in a dream in detail, according to the great Arab translators and scholars. Snow is one of the most important cosmic events that has many meanings and different interpretations, and many people search for it and want to know whether it is a good or bad dream, so in this text we will discuss in detail what is the interpretation of the dream of snow. In a dream with all its details and seeing snow is not the same from person to person. Therefore, we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing snow with ease for singles, unmarried, married, pregnant and married people, and what is bad and good to see snow in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing snow by Ibn Sirin: To see snow in his season is evidence of the elimination of worries and the imposition of rivals and envy, and often in the snow the Sultan tortured people. And he took their money. As for seeing some snow in a dream, it is fruitful, and whoever sees snow falling on him will travel far, and perhaps evil will happen to him. Whoever sees himself sleeping in the snow in a dream, this indicates the torment of the one who sees the vision. Likewise, whoever sees that he is cold in winter or summer, he Poor. Whoever sees that he is buying snow in the summer, he will earn money to comfort himself and relieve him of sadness with kind and blessed words, and if they do not harm him and the snow melts quickly, then anxiety and fatigue will be. . And they disappear quickly. Whoever sees that the land is planted in drought and then snow falls, this is evidence of mercy, kindness, and blessing. The dreamer sees that he is in a country where there is a lot of snow at the wrong time, and he will be punished by God Almighty, or a punishment from the Sultan, or a trial between him and one of the people. Whoever sees snow falling on him, this indicates that the enemy will take him, and a large amount of snow indicates general diseases such as smallpox and epidemics. Snow sometimes indicates war and locusts, and can indicate that he is fruitful, productive, and wealthy. Whoever sees snow falling from the sky and covering the entire earth, this indicates On the benefit, blessing, and abundance of light, even if the snow is at the right time, which is beneficial for the poor and needy, and perhaps the snow indicates siege and neglect. From traveling and seeking a pension.. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream. Interpretation of seeing snow alone. In general, snow in a single woman’s dream is evidence of achieving what she wants in her life, specifically if she sees snow falling on her, she will achieve her goals in reality. Also, A girl who sees snow in a dream is good news about joy and happiness for her. Seeing an unmarried woman playing with snow in a dream means that she is troubled and unstable in her life, financially or morally. An unmarried woman who sees herself eating snow in a dream indicates that she will get Money after patience, a lot of it. As for seeing yourself running in the snow in a dream, this indicates a state of quarrels and instability. As for seeing an unmarried woman wearing a snow dress in a dream, this indicates marriage, as the snow has a beautiful shine. Interpretation of a dream Snow for a married woman: It is not the same for a married woman to see snow here, which indicates the psychological stability she experiences in her life and her sense of security. The woman who did not give birth indicated that

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about someone colliding with a car, according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about someone hitting a camel, the car is considered a double-edged sword because of the many advantages we get from driving and ease of transportation. On the other hand, just being hit by it can end a person's life, so when you see someone hit by a car in a dream, he has many questions that he wants us to answer, including the interpretation of this dream? What will it return to him from the interpretation, whether good or bad? We will answer all these questions by presenting the largest number of issues related to this symbol, in addition to the interpretations of senior scholars and commentators such as the scholar Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a person being hit by a car Seeing a person being hit by a car in a dream has many connotations and signs that can be recognized through the following cases: If the dreamer sees in a dream that a person is being hit by a car, this symbolizes some crises that he will face in the coming period. Seeing a person being hit by a car in a dream means that he has the evil eye and envy and he must protect himself and read the Holy Quran and get closer to God to protect him. The dreamer seeing that a person is being hit by a car in a dream and dies and cries over it indicates his sincere repentance for the sins committed in the past and the acceptance of God’s good deeds. Interpretation of a dream about a person being hit by a car by Ibn Sirin Cars did not exist in Ibn Sirin’s time, so we will compare his interpretations related to means of transportation at that time, and the following are some of the interpretations that came from him: The interpretation of dreams of a person being hit by a car in a dream according to Ibn Sirin explains the difficulties and obstacles that the dreamer faces on his way to achieving his goals. Seeing a car hitting someone in a dream indicates The dreamer's failure in a romantic relationship will bring him many problems and he needs to get rid of them in order to live a more peaceful life. If the dreamer sees in a dream that someone was hit by a car and he escaped from it, this symbolizes his liberation from the plots and calamities that were set up for him by people who hate him. Interpretation of a dream of a single woman being hit by a car The interpretation of seeing someone being hit by a car in a dream varies according to the dreamer's social status, and the following is the interpretation of an unmarried girl who sees this symbol: An unmarried girl who sees in a dream that someone is being hit by a car indicates that her marriage will be delayed for a period, which makes her psychological state bad and she must pray to God for a righteous husband. If a single girl sees that someone was involved in a traffic accident in a dream, this symbolizes the difficulty of achieving her goals and dreams despite her tireless efforts. A person who was hit by a car in an individual dream indicates the pressures and crises that have plagued her life. Interpretation of a dream of a car colliding with a car for a married woman A married woman who sees someone being hit by a car in a dream indicates the instability of her marital life and the outbreak of some disputes and conflicts between her and her husband, which leads to Divorce. A person who was hit by a car in a dream and survived is a sign of an important breakthrough in her life in the coming period. Seeing a person hit by a car for a married woman indicates fears and pains that will

title: Interpretation of a dream about planting in a dream

preview.html: Planting in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about planting and rain. Planting in dreams is considered one of the most common visions and reflects many worldly problems and fears, especially if the dreamer is planting land that he does not own, but rather brings a lot of money for planting it and harvesting his land. The vision depends on the dreamer’s social position. You may know Also, the toilet in a dream, the vision of a married woman is different from the vision of a single woman. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream Planting in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about agriculture and rain Planting in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about agriculture and news Seeing agriculture in a dream is good food, and a dream about secret agriculture can be good news for a pregnancy My wife. The fertile land in your dreams is nothing but a good wife who will bring you intelligent offspring. The dry and barren lands will die or the dreamers will be afflicted with serious diseases, and God knows best. It is good to cultivate the land in a dream, which is the marriage of bachelors and unmarried people. Burning agricultural lands in a dream represents multiple economic crises and extreme poverty. Read also: Pumpkin in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Shaheen’s dream about agriculture in dreams. Ibn Shaheen sees that agriculture in a dream is nothing but a distant desire and the fulfillment of ambitions, and green lands test fertility and abundance of health, money and blessings for children. Watering agricultural lands in a dream is God’s happiness and success and shows the abundance of money and livelihood. Which he and his family receive from halal sources without effort. Wheat in dreams is a lot of money and a lot of food, and seeing insects on the farm is annoying, which is interpreted as weakness and loss of money. Clearing the land, harvesting in a dream, a good and close marriage for a single woman, and pregnancy Married women: It is good to cultivate and fertilize the land inside or in front of the house. Dreamers may quickly get rid of life's problems and worries and suffer from material and psychological crises ordered by God. Dry or dead land in dreams is undesirable and reflects life's difficulties and the inability to take responsibility for oneself. Walking in the fields is a great blessing and blessing for dreamers, and the vision may indicate status. Good manners and good morals. Read also: I saw my husband getting married. Interpretation of a dream about farming in a dream for a married, single, and pregnant woman. Wife: Seeing agricultural land in a married woman’s dreams means an abundance of food and the appearance of new children, which can also contribute to the prosperity and kindness of the home. In the dream, gathering women Married women early to bring evil and many daily problems and worries can represent a loss in business. A married woman who grows vegetables at home is considered a reward, a lot of halal money, and a prestigious job. Singles: Seeing a green farm in a dream for an unmarried woman means a happy life and many Food that is received from a source. The death and yellowing of plants in the dreams of an unmarried woman is bad, and her vision is not good and reflects the major problems and fears of her life. Pregnant woman: A pregnant woman’s dream reflects the psychological state she is experiencing in reality. The green land is the comfort of childbirth and tuberculosis

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing lice in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see lice in a dream for senior dream interpretation researchers on our website, moments, lice are a small black insect and lice are present when personal hygiene is not observed. It has an interpretation and meaning that many are looking for, and then we will discuss in detail what is the interpretation of the dream of seeing lice in a dream according to the great Arab interpreters and scholars. Interpretation of the dream of lice by Ibn Sirin The respected scholar Ibn Sirin interprets the interpretation of lice in general in a dream as a symbol of worldly life and money. Anyone who has an excellent job and sees in his dream that lice are smooth in his new clothes, his dream is good news to update his situation and maintain it again. As for the one who saw lice falling on old clothes, his dream symbolizes a debt that he has not yet healed. As for the one who was suffering from an illness and saw in a dream that lice were flying from him, his dream is news of an urgent recovery from this disease. As for the one who was a ruler and saw in a dream that lice were flying over him, his dream symbolizes the escape of his assistants from him. Interpretation of the dream of seeing lice around Al-Nabulsi The scholar Muhammad Al-Nabulsi interprets the dream of lice in the dreamer's dream as unpleasant. Whoever sees in a dream that he is throwing a live louse, his vision indicates that the owner of the dream is doing what is contrary to the Sunnah and Sharia. As for the one who was sick and saw lice In his dream, his vision symbolizes the duration of his illness. As for the one who was sick and saw in his dream that he was killing lice, his vision symbolizes his recovery from that disease, God willing. As for the one who saw in his dream that he was bitten by lice, his dream indicates the presence of grudges, then he denies them. Interpretation of the dream of lice by Ibn Shaheen Seeing lice crawling in a dream is good news about the dreamer assuming a prestigious position in the state. Perhaps seeing lice indicates a lot of nourishment and affection that will come to the owner of this vision. As for the one who saw that lice were eating from his body, his dream symbolizes the disobedience of his children. Interpretation of the dream of lice for a single woman Seeing lice in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates the presence of an evil friend in her life who seeks to harm or hurt her. Interpretation of the dream of lice for a married woman Seeing a married woman as if lice were flying from her chest, this is evidence that one of her friends has already escaped. As for the vision of a married woman throwing a live louse from her, this indicates that she has committed something that violates the teachings of religion. As for the interpretation of the dream of seeing lice, it is Common in the clothes prepared for a married woman, it indicates that her partner lied to her in reality. Seeing lice eating the flesh of a married woman in a dream means that her children will steal her away. Seeing a wet wedding in a dream for a married woman symbolizes competition. Interpretation of a dream about lice for a pregnant woman The dream of a pregnant woman infected with lice indicates an easy birth for her and the health of her fetus. Interpretation of a dream about lice for a man Seeing a man working as a lice teacher in his dream is evidence that the students are learning from him. Seeing a man picking lice from himself in a dream while he is alive and getting rid of them means warning and warning that he is violating the law in a certain matter. Interpretation of a dream about black lice Seeing black lice in a dream, as interpreted by some scholars of interpretation, indicates

Seeing soap in a dream and buying it is a sign of kindness and wide grace for the dreamer and reaching the dreams and aspirations that he seeks in his life. Seeing buying white soap in a dream indicates the appearance of happy news for the dreamer. The closest contact with the dreamer, whether it is a girl or a man, is a sign of love and closeness between the spouses in family relationships. Interpretation of a dream about liquid soap by Al-Osaimi: The appearance of liquid soap of any kind in a dream is a sign of earning a lot of money without effort or fatigue, as well as a sign of the arrival of goodness and blessings. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a waterfall in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a waterfall in a dream is a correct scientific interpretation on our website Moments, the largest site for interpreting dreams. A waterfall is the fall of streams of water from a high seat onto hard rocks and soft rocks, and for this water causes erosion in these rocks and hollows, which in turn are called waterfalls, but what is the interpretation? The correct view is to see a waterfall in a dream, as this vision indicates many clues, as we will learn about them according to the great Arab translators. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a waterfall by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing a waterfall in a dream as the fulfillment of the dreamer’s dreams and desires. Seeing a waterfall in a dream indicates that the dreamer has a big and brave heart. Also, seeing a waterfall in a dream indicates the dreamer’s good fortune. Seeing a waterfall in a dream symbolizes To the arrival of goodness for the dreamer. Seeing a waterfall in a dream indicates an improvement in the dreamer’s economic and moral conditions. Seeing a waterfall in a dream symbolizes the dreamer’s success in life and an ascetic life. Seeing waterfalls in a dream indicates the dreamer’s ability to take good future measures. Interpretation of a dream about rain in a waterfallSeeing rainfall Rain in the waterfalls indicates that the dreamer is very generous. This vision also shows that the dreamer brings blessings and sustenance to everyone around him. It also states that this dreamer’s prayer is answered. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a waterfallSeeing the dreamer looking at the waterfall means an abundance of goodness and abundance. As this vision indicates To a shift in professional life. It indicates good news about a big promotion at work. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a waterfallSeeing the dreamer as if he is swimming in a waterfall is an indication that worries and sorrows will go away. This vision also indicates the coming of comfort and goodness. It also indicates the fulfillment of In the goals that he is working on. It also indicates that the dreamer will live in a happy romantic relationship. Interpretation of a dream about jumping over a waterfall. Seeing himself jumping over a waterfall is news to the dreamer that goodness will come to him and he will obtain psychological comfort. It also indicates the collapse of worries and problems. Seeing a jump over a waterfall means You will actually get a lot of money.

title: Interpretation of crying in a dream

preview.html: Which one is good and the other is bad, as the interpretation is done through the nature of the dream and the nature of God, and through those that we will include in the next article we will show all the evidence that arose in it, so they stayed with us. Interpretations of seeing crying in a dream If someone sees in his dream that he is crying intensely. This may indicate Until the good news, happiness, and more food that the fortuneteller will receive. In the event that a person sees in a dream a serious dream, he cries and fears committing a sin in reality. This may indicate the success of the dreamer and his sincere repentance. When someone sees in a dream that he is crying loudly He complains about bad news or something sad in reality. This is an indication that his anxiety will go away and his sadness will go away. Whoever sees that he is not crying in his sleep, but rather that his eyes are tearing up. This may suggest that it is good news of good news, relieving stress and solving problems, as it indicates the innocence of the oppressed. God willing. When he saw someone in a dream he cried profusely. This may indicate the fulfillment of long-awaited desires and desires. It also shows a response to a long-awaited invitation, God willing. When a woman sees in her dream that she is crying but her tears welled up in her eyes, this may indicate the approaching Have mercy on her, God willing. When a woman sees in her dream that she is listening to the Qur’an and through what she heard, she begins to cry. This is evidence of the purity of her heart, as it indicates a pure soul, her closeness to God, and good deeds. When a woman sees in her dream that she is crying blood, then this Good news. It indicates the dreamer’s repentance for the actions and sins that she was committing, but she had a desire to get closer to God. Interpretation of intense crying over someone she loves in a single person’s dream: If a single person sees in his dream that he is crying. This may indicate that he will get married soon, as He will travel to any country he wants. When a single man sees in a dream that he is crying a lot. In this good news is that the one who got angry with him will return to join him. If a young man dreams that he is crying and screaming, this may mean that it is an unpleasant vision. See also: Interpretation of dreams about crying Over the dead. Interpretation of intense crying over a living person. If a person dreams that he is crying without crying and does not cry over a sick person. This is good news that this sick person will be cured by God. If a mother sees in a dream that she is crying over her unmarried daughter. This may indicate her success and superiority in her life. Scientific. It also indicates that she will marry a man who will satisfy her very much. Interpretation of a dream about screaming loudly according to Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi shows that when a person sees intense crying in a dream. This may explain the amount of sadness and pain in the soul of the dreamer. However, he does not want to tell anyone, Then his subconscious mind removes this dream to make things easier for him. Al-Nabulsi explains in his interpretations that if a person sees in a dream, he is crying profusely. This is an indication of the responsibilities that are burdening him because he has become unable to bear them. It also shows a reflection of his psychological state in that period that he is going through. Al-Nabulsi explains that when a person sees in a dream that he is crying a lot, this may mean that he is starting a new life as he wants. This is an indication of the overwhelming joy that will come to him after he hears...

title: Interpretation of a dream about the desert in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about the desert in a dream, which is a geographical area characterized by a lack of rain, and therefore plants and animals cannot coexist in it due to the harsh environmental conditions. Many people see their dreams of the desert or walk in the desert and feel puzzled by this vision, and we will give you a comprehensive explanation about seeing the desert in The dream. Interpretation of a dream about the desert by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained in his interpretation of seeing one walking in the desert in a dream, as it indicates that the dreamer is looking for a specific thing in reality. Seeing the desert in a dream indicates happiness and pleasure in reality. As for a vision of a happy and prosperous desert, it indicates The coming of goodness and prosperity. Seeing a green desert in a dream full of roses means that the dreamer will gain a lot of knowledge. Also, seeing a walk in the green desert indicates success in the dreamer’s journey. Seeing him walking in the vast desert shows the happiness he will have with his family. You can watch the interpretation of a dream about a camel In a dream, Interpretation of a dream about the desert by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen’s explanation from its beginning. Seeing the desert indicates that the dreamer is looking for something very difficult, but soon he will feel relieved. Seeing the desert in a dream indicates the coming of happiness and pleasure. Seeing the desert in green indicates moving to a new place. Seeing a picnic In the vast desert to make the dreamer happy with his family. Interpretation of a dream about walking in the desert: Seeing a dreamer walking in the desert indicates isolation and loneliness. Also, seeing yourself walking in the desert indicates the romantic emptiness and extreme boredom that the dreamer feels. Seeing yourself walking in the desert feeling lost indicates The dreamer’s inability to escape from situations in his life. To see a desert with a lake or residence at the end of it, is good news of marriage. Interpretation of a dream about the desert for a woman: Seeing a woman standing in the desert indicates that she is unhappy with her married life. As indicated by walking in the desert in a dream, it indicates loss and bad luck. Luck and despair. Also, seeing the desert in a dream is a sign of loss of property or lives.

title: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing glass in a dream

preview.html: Learn more about seeing glass in a dream and its interpretation. Glass in a dream is one of the important visions that many people are searching for, and who do not know the true meaning of this vision. Also, seeing broken glass in a dream differs in its interpretation from seeing it as intact and without impurities or defects. Interpretation of a dream about a cup: If a married woman sees broken glasses in a dream, this means that she will suffer from some disagreement and it may reach the point of ruin between her and one of her relatives. As for the married woman If a woman dreams that a glass is broken but is repaired, this vision indicates that this woman is suffering from some problems in her private life, but in the coming period she will be able to overcome them and get rid of them. Completely from them. An unmarried young man’s glass, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, means that he will get married soon, but if he sees himself holding a glass, this indicates his arrogance. What does drinking a glass mean in a dream? If a person sees in a dream that he has a glass and that he is eating some of it, then this vision is not Good for the dreamer, as it indicates that he will suffer from a lot of worries and sorrows in the coming period. If someone sees in a dream that he is eating a certain amount of glass, this vision is evidence that the dreamer is always seeking some things from which he does not benefit.. As for the person Whoever dreams of the same vision as the previous one, it can be a sign and warning for the dreamer, as he will soon have new friendships, but this friendship will be one of the worst friendships for him and will bring him a lot. Material damage. To reach the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search for the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Glass in a dream by Ibn SirinIf a married woman sees in a dream that she has a crystal but it is broken and broken in this vision, this means that this The woman faces many obstacles and financial crises, but in the coming period she will be able to get rid of them. Completely. If a married woman sees the previous vision, this is a sign that this woman will pay off her debt soon. This previous vision and this interpretation that it conveys is the same interpretation for a woman whether she is married, divorced, or widowed, and finally the same interpretation for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about broken glassIf a girl sees For an unmarried woman in her dream that she has a group of broken bottles in front of her, this means that this girl is facing a series of problems and obstacles that she does not have the ability to confront and get rid of. If an unmarried girl sees that she is doomed to broken glass, but this glass is being repaired, then this vision is evidence of Many of the problems that this girl faces will soon be able to get rid of them and deal with them. As for a married woman who dreams of a broken glass, this indicates that this married woman will suffer in the near future from many problems that she faces in her private marital life. Broken glass In a married man’s dream, it means that he will suffer from quarrels with his wife. As for...

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of the presence of a ladder in a dream

preview.html: Learn more about the interpretation of the appearance of stairs in a dream. Stairs are used to move between different floors and come in different shapes, sizes and even in the materials they are made of. With the advent of modern technology, many stairs have appeared in new shapes and additions such as escalators and elevators. Seeing stairs in a dream has many interpretations, which depend on the person’s condition on the one hand, and the type of stairs on the other hand, and the person’s position on climbing the stairs, was it fast or slow? To get the correct interpretation, search Google for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of seeing stairs in a dream In Sheikh Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation, a wooden ladder indicates difficulties and problems in trips and journeys, and it can also indicate sadness and sorrow. Solid concrete stairs indicate a state of stability in which the dreamer is, and it can be stability in principles, morals and values. If the ladder is placed on the ground, this indicates the illness of its owner, and if it is seen standing, this indicates complete health and well-being. Ibn Sirin also mentioned that seeing stairs in a dream without others is hypocrisy. Al-Nabulsi also mentions that dreaming of peace in a dream for everyone who is afraid is safety and peace, and he based this on the word peace derived from From peace. Rope ladders indicate an open person who calms others and uses logic to achieve his goals. Escalators or moving stairs, for example, are disturbing and destabilizing. As for the glass ladder, it shows that a person depends on the women of his house. What is the interpretation of climbing stairs in a dream? Whoever climbs a wooden ladder in a dream orders good for those who do not love good and are not from its people, as well as forbidding evil for those who do not stay away from the path of evil and do not accept advice. Ibn Sirin says that whoever looks at the wooden stairs in a dream asks for help from hypocrites or argues against a person. It was mentioned in one of the interpretations that climbing an endless ladder means that his end is near. The inability to climb the ladder means laziness and laziness of the person. Climbing the stairs in a dream According to Al-Nabulsi, climbing a new ladder means that good will befall a person in his religious and worldly affairs. Climbing the old ladder is a profit from trade. If a person is interested in power and positions, climbing the stairs means graduating in positions. Breaking the ladder while standing on it in a dream means the victory of your enemy over you. What is the interpretation of falling from the stairs in a dream for a married woman? A married woman descended the stairs It means her divorce from her husband or her negligence in one of her life matters. Seeing a married woman peace shows joy in her world and with her family and children. For a woman who does not have children, the dream of falling in love with her means the age after which she will lose hope of having children. Sources: - 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad bin Sirin, Dar Al-Ma'rifah, Beirut 2000. 2- Dictionary of Dream Interpretation, Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi, research by Basil Breidy. Al-Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 3- The Book of Perfumes of the Sleeping Expression of the Dream, Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-
